entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump When will you realise this is NOT a popularity contest! People are dying needlessly because you initially dismissed COVID-19 as an inconsequence and a hoax. Have you EVER apologised to the hundreds possibly thousands of families who have suffered loss due to YOUR inaction??????
